data.title: Sevalanka Foundation
data.meta_description: It is not what you do for your community, but what you have taught them to do for themselves, that will make them successfully self-sufficient.
data.text: Sevalanka Foundation is registered as a Voluntary Social Services Organization under the Ministry of Social Services and as a Non-Governmental Organizations under the Companies Act No.17 of 1982, N (PBG) 20. Act, and under No. 31 of 1980 as amended by Act No. 8 of 1998; and subsequently incorporated under the Companies Act No. 07 of 2007 â€“ under Registration No - GL41.
